title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: e-Learning Types Using Expository Instruction and Mathematical Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics curriculum knowledge and basic database skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain characteristics of synchronous (instructor-led) and asynchronous (learner-led) e-learning types.
Learners can propose three or more instructional models combining expository teaching methods with e-learning types in math curriculum design.
Learners can derive two or more strategies to enhance academic achievement by analyzing formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
